author: Justin Morgan <justin.l.morgan@gmail.com>
description: A collection of functional extras for Node.js.
name: functional-extras

scripts.build: npm run docs && npm run lint && npm run coverage
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover --dir build/coverage mocha -- 'test/**/*Spec.js' && istanbul report html --dir build/coverage
scripts.postversion: git log -1 && git diff --cached HEAD^ && git push origin
scripts.preversion: git checkout -b release/$(npm run --silent next-version) origin/dev
scripts.semver-level: git log origin/dev ^master --format=%b | grep -i semver | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sort -u | head -1 | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]'
scripts.version: git add package.json && git commit -m "Version bump to $(npm run --silent package-version)"
